about_the_game:
Get an EPIC boost to your power with a set of rare items and an exclusive Golden Epic for Mindy the Mime. Unlock her if you don't already have her. Plus we'll also throw in 3000 Common Crafting Materials!

This pack includes:
  • Mindy the Mime herself (if you don't already own her)
  • The Sparkling Hat of Feathered Duplication (Golden Epic)
  • Two other Rare items for Mindy the Mime
  • 3000 Common Crafting Materials
